typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can do the operation"

arguments.value: Only the owner can do the operation

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can do the operation"

nodes.documentation:
@dev constructor of the contract
 @param _priceFeedSource address of price Feed Source -> should be maker feeds Medianizer contract

@dev gives the owner the possibility to put the Interface into an emergencyMode, which will
 output always a price of 600 USD. This gives everyone time to set up a new pricefeed.
nodes.name: raiseEmergency

nodes.documentation:
@dev updates the priceFeedSource
 @param _owner address of owner
nodes.name: updateCurator

nodes.documentation: @dev returns the USDETH price, ie gets the USD price from Maker feed with 18 digits, but last 18 digits are cut off

nodes.name: getUSDETHPrice

params._priceFeedSource: address of price Feed Source -> should be maker feeds Medianizer contract

getUSDETHPrice().details: returns the USDETH price, ie gets the USD price from Maker feed with 18 digits, but last 18 digits are cut off

raiseEmergency(bool).details: gives the owner the possibility to put the Interface into an emergencyMode, which will output always a price of 600 USD. This gives everyone time to set up a new pricefeed.
